Create Charge.body:
# `source` is obtained with Stripe.js; see https://stripe.com/docs/payments/accept-a-payment-charges#web-create-token
stripe.Charge.create(
  amount=${1:2000},
  currency="${2:usd}",
  source="${3:tok_xxxx}",
  description="${4:My First Test Charge (created for API docs)}",
)

Confirm Payment Intent.body:
# To create a PaymentIntent for confirmation, see our guide at: https://mock.stripe.com/docs/payments/payment-intents/creating-payment-intents#creating-for-automatic
stripe.PaymentIntent.confirm(
  "${1:pi_xxxxxxxxxxxxx}",
  payment_method="${2:pm_card_visa}",
)

Capture Payment Intent.body:
# To create a requires_capture PaymentIntent, see our guide at: https://mock.stripe.com/docs/payments/capture-later
stripe.PaymentIntent.capture("${1:pi_xxxxxxxxxxxxx}")

Cancel Payment Intent.body:
# To create a PaymentIntent, see our guide at: https://mock.stripe.com/docs/payments/payment-intents/creating-payment-intents#creating-for-automatic
stripe.PaymentIntent.cancel("${1:pi_xxxxxxxxxxxxx}")

List Credit Note Credit Note Line Item.description: List Credit Note Credit Note Line Item

Create Tax Rate.body:
stripe.TaxRate.create(
  display_name="${1:VAT}",
  description="${2:VAT Germany}",
  jurisdiction="${3:DE}",
  percentage=${4:16},
  inclusive=False,
)

List Subscription Item Usage Record Summ.description: List Subscription Item Usage Record Summary

Create Topup.body:
stripe.Topup.create(
  amount=${1:2000},
  currency="${2:usd}",
  description="${3:Top-up for Jenny Rosen}",
  statement_descriptor="${4:Top-up}",
)

Create Radar Value List.body:
stripe.radar.ValueList.create(
  alias="${1:custom_ip_xxxxxxxxxxxxx}",
  name="${2:Custom IP Blocklist}",
  item_type="${3:ip_address}",
)
